com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.shapeeffect

Class SpenFillColorEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.shapeeffect.SpenFillEffectBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.shapeeffect.SpenFillColorEffect

  • public class SpenFillColorEffect
extends SpenFillEffectBase
    SpenFillColorEffect class. This class manages color effects which fill shapes. The effects are solid color, gradient color.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenFillColorEffect

        public SpenFillColorEffect()
        Creates a SpenFillColorEffect instance. If effect is gradation, at least two colors are required. So, default two gradientColors(Blue, White) are set with creation.
        See Also:
        appendGradientColor(GradientColor)

      • appendGradientColor

        public int appendGradientColor(SpenFillColorEffect.GradientColor gradientColor)
        Append gradient color to the end of gradient color list.
        Parameters:
        gradientColor - Gradient color to append
        Returns:
        New ID of the gradient color after it appends.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the gradientColor is null.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the count of gradient colors reaches to maximum(10).
        See Also:
        getGradientColorCount(), getGradientColor(int), getGradientColorId(int), removeGradientColor(int)

      • removeGradientColor

        public void removeGradientColor(int id)
        Remove gradient color
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of gradient color to remove
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if id does not exist.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if colors less than 3 for gradation.
        See Also:
        appendGradientColor(GradientColor), getGradientColorCount(), getGradientColor(int), getGradientColorId(int)
